0010010010111101 1011101100110001 0 -> sum: 1101111111101110, cout: 0
0100101111001100 0000010000100101 0 -> sum: 0100111111110001, cout: 0

0110101110100111 1000010001101101 1 -> sum: 1111000000010101, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
